1.0.0.name: wordpress/enhanced-recent-posts
1.0.0.description:
A plugin for wordpress which enhances the built-in "Recent Posts" widget by offering many more options:

  • exclude or include categories
  • select number of posts displayed
  • show the date
  • and more...

If you like our plugins, you might want to check our website for more.

If you want to get updates about our plugins, you can: * Follow use on Twitter * Follow use on Google+ * Follow use on Facebook
